duties_responsibilities.duty: Drive store sales and metrics by outfitting each client with uniquely special jewelry pieces that symbolize intimate moments and create memories for years to come.
Develop customer relationships that span generations of family through excellent customer service and in-depth product knowledge.
Meet/exceed personal weekly, monthly, and annual sales goals.
Develop client base by asking each customer to complete a client profile card and using customer cards to drive Fine Jewelry sales and special events.
Assist customers in the selection of Fine Jewelry merchandise and offer complimentary items with each customer purchase.
Complete minor repairs on Fine Jewelry to include removing watch links, changing watch batteries, and maintain Fine Jewelry merchandising and visual standards.
Check-in and replenish merchandise inside case lines, prepare merchandise transfers and repairs, and complete customer repair envelopes.
Follow all procedures for inventory counts, move to Clearance projects, and maintain Belk professional standards for dress attire and appearance.
Cooperate and collaborate with fellow associates, management, and business partners.
Complete all required Fine Jewelry Training and pass quizzes with a minimum score of 80.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma. Fine Jewelry experience preferred, retail or sales experience required.
